title.rendered: Free Summer Meals for Kids in Saratoga County

content.rendered:
Free summer meal sites are offered throughout Saratoga County beginning June 26.  Summer meals are available to all children age 18 and under.

Maple Avenue Middle School is an open site for free lunch pick-up. Pick-up is available from 11:30 a.m. to 12 p.m. at the outdoor classroom in front of the school.

Click here to view a list of Saratoga County summer meal sites to find one near you.

If you have questions about the program, please call 518-371-1185.
